original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī pacchābhattaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdatipi abhinipajjatipi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī pacchābhattam kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdati pi abhinipajjati pi

original: Manussā thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ hirīyamānā āsane neva abhinisīdanti na abhinipajjanti.
analyzed: manussāḥ thullanandam bhikkhunim hirīyamānāḥ āsane na iva abhinisīdanti na abhinipajjanti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā pacchābhattaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdissatipi abhinipajjissatipī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā pacchābhattam kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdissati pi abhinipajjissati pi iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā pacchābhattaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdissatipi abhinipajjissatipī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā pacchābhattam kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdissati pi abhinipajjissati pi iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī pacchābhattaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdatipi abhinipajjatipī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī pacchābhattam kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdati pi abhinipajjati pi iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī pacchābhattaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdissatipi abhinipajjissatipi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī pacchābhattam kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdissati pi abhinipajjissati pi
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī pacchābhattaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī pacchābhattam kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: cattāri kulāni— khattiyakulaṁ, brāhmaṇakulaṁ, vessakulaṁ, suddakulaṁ.
analyzed: cattāri kulāni khattiya kula brāhmaṇa kula vessa kula sudda kula

original: yo tasmiṁ kule manusso sāmiko dātuṁ, taṁ anāpucchā.
analyzed: yaḥ tasmim kule manussaḥ sāmikaḥ dātu tam an āpucchā

original: Anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an āpucchite an āpucchita saññā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anāpucchite vematikā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an āpucchite vematikā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an āpucchite āpucchita saññā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā āpatti pācittiyassa
āpucchite an āpucchita saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: āpucchā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā,
analyzed: āpucchā āsane abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā
